content.text:
# Draft:2023 Valley City State Vikings football team

The 2023 Valley City State Vikings football team represented Valley City State University during the 2023 NAIA football season as a member of the North Star Athletic Association (NSAA).
Led by 30th-year head coach Dennis McCulloch, the Vikings played their home games at Lokken Stadium in Valley City, North Dakota. The Vikings finished the season 7–3 overall and 6–2 in NSAA play, highlighted by a season-opening win over rival Jamestown, as well as victories over Dakota State and Waldorf.

Honors
All-Conference
Conference postseason awards were announced by the North Star Athletic Association on November 20, 2023.
First Team All-Conference
* OL – Jacob Romero (Sr.)
* DL – Riley Gerhardt (Sr.)
* DL – Georgie Mageo (Jr.)
* LB – Jahidi West (Sr.)
* DB – Paco Baltazar (Sr.)
Second Team All-Conference
* RB – Justice Bice (Sr.)
* OL – Troy Dietz (Sr.)
* DL – Georgie Mageo (Jr.)
* DB – Micah Olson (Jr.)
* DB – Emanuel Spiyee (Fr.)
Honorable Mention
* OL – Kade Queen
* OL – Taylor Jones
* WR – Austin Young
* TE – Trent Finney
All-Americans
The NAIA released its 2023 All-American team on December 13, 2023.
Coaching staff
* Dennis McCulloch – Head Coach / Defensive Backs (30th season)
* Gregg Horner – Defensive Coordinator / Defensive Line (30th season)
* Dustin Yorek – Offensive Coordinator / Offensive Line  (5th season)
* Brandon Bouma – Recruiting Coordinator / Running Backs (7th season)
* Dave Rausch – Defensive Assistant (37th season)
* Trent Kosel – Offensive Assistant (3rd season)
* Alec Brown – Graduate Assistant / Linebackers / Special Teams Coordinator (3rd season)
* Ethan Postler – Quarterbacks / Wide Receivers (1st season)
